title: README
description: When creating policies, you can define remediation grace periods for Minimum Scan Score, Component Blocklist Enforcement, Component Licenses, and Vulnerability CVSS Score rules. You can also specify grace periods by severity that apply to Findings by Severity, Security Standard, Findings by CWE ID, and Findings in CWE Category rules.

author: Scott Jordan
frontMatter.ft:title: Applying Grace Periods to a Policy
